title: How many books should I publish for my first book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only one thing can be your First. Everything that comes after that is a new number. You can have a First short story, First fiction novel, First non-fiction novel, First poem—those are all groupings. But there will still only ever be one First Published Book—the first one you published.

That’s up to you. If you have several that are ready publish them at the same time. I did this 19 years ago. I self published 3 novels and 8 short story collections as my first book. I should have waited because I noticed a few spelling errors. If you’re not sure, just publish one for now.
